com.cloudant.http

Interface HttpConnectionRequestInterceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CookieInterceptor

    public interface HttpConnectionRequestInterceptor
    A Request Interceptor is run before the request is made to the server. It can use headers to add support for other authentication methods, for example cookie authentication. See CookieInterceptor.interceptRequest(HttpConnectionInterceptorContext) for an example. Interceptors are executed in a pipeline and modify the context in a serial fashion.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpConnectionInterceptorContext interceptRequest(HttpConnectionInterceptorContext context)
      Intercept the request.

    • Method Detail

      • interceptRequest

        HttpConnectionInterceptorContext interceptRequest(HttpConnectionInterceptorContext context)
        Intercept the request. This method must not do any of the following:
        • Return null
        • Call methods on the underlying HttpURLConnection which initiate a request such as HttpURLConnection.getResponseCode()
        Parameters:
        context - Input context
        Returns:
        Output context
